name: stardew-mcp
description: Stardew Valley AI Controller - Control and automate Stardew Valley gameplay

tools.name: get_state
tools.description: Get complete game state including player position, inventory, time, location, and stats

tools.name: get_surroundings
tools.description: Get detailed information about nearby tiles, objects, NPCs, and terrain

tools.name: move_to
tools.description: Navigate player to specified X,Y coordinates using pathfinding

tools.name: interact
tools.description: Interact with the object or NPC directly in front of the player

tools.name: use_tool
tools.description: Use the currently selected tool (hoe, watering can, pickaxe, etc.)

tools.name: use_tool_repeat
tools.description: Use tool repeatedly with configurable delay

count.description: Number of times to use tool

tools.name: select_item
tools.description: Select an item from inventory by slot number

tools.name: switch_tool
tools.description: Switch to a tool by name

tool.description: Tool name (hoe, watering_can, pickaxe, axe, sword, etc.)

tools.name: face_direction
tools.description: Change the direction the player is facing

tools.name: eat_item
tools.description: Eat an item from inventory to restore energy/health

tools.name: enter_door
tools.description: Enter a building or mine shaft when standing at a door/warp point

tools.name: find_best_target
tools.description: Find the nearest actionable object (harvestable crop, ore, tree, etc.)

type.description: Target type: crop, ore, tree, forage, monster, npc

tools.name: clear_target
tools.description: Clear the current target selection

tools.name: cheat_mode_enable
tools.description: Enable god-mode cheat commands (must enable before using any cheat)

tools.name: cheat_mode_disable
tools.description: Disable cheat mode

tools.name: cheat_time_freeze
tools.description: Freeze/unfreeze game time

freeze.description: true to freeze, false to unfreeze

tools.name: cheat_infinite_energy
tools.description: Enable/disable infinite energy

enable.description: true to enable, false to disable

tools.name: cheat_warp
tools.description: Teleport to any location

location.description: Location name: Farm, Town, Beach, Mountain, Mine, etc.

tools.name: cheat_mine_warp
tools.description: Warp to a specific mine level

tools.name: cheat_hoe_all
tools.description: Till all soil in the current area

tools.name: cheat_water_all
tools.description: Water all crops in the current area

tools.name: cheat_grow_crops
tools.description: Grow all crops to harvestable state instantly

tools.name: cheat_harvest_all
tools.description: Harvest all ready crops in the current area

tools.name: cheat_plant_seeds
tools.description: Plant season-appropriate seeds on all tilled soil

tools.name: cheat_fertilize_all
tools.description: Apply fertilizer to all soil

tools.name: cheat_clear_debris
tools.description: Clear all debris in the current area

tools.name: cheat_cut_trees
tools.description: Cut down all trees in the current area

tools.name: cheat_mine_rocks
tools.description: Break all mine rocks in the current area

tools.name: cheat_dig_artifacts
tools.description: Dig up all artifact spots in the current area

tools.name: cheat_hoe_tiles
tools.description: Create a pattern of tilled tiles

tools.name: cheat_clear_tiles
tools.description: Clear objects from tiles in a pattern

tools.name: cheat_set_money
tools.description: Set player's money to a specific amount

tools.name: cheat_add_item
tools.description: Add an item to inventory by ID

tools.name: cheat_spawn_ores
tools.description: Spawn ore nodes in the mine

type.description: Ore type: copper, iron, gold, iridium

tools.name: cheat_set_friendship
tools.description: Set friendship level with an NPC

tools.name: cheat_max_all_friendships
tools.description: Max out friendship with all NPCs

tools.name: cheat_give_gift
tools.description: Give a gift to an NPC

tools.name: cheat_upgrade_backpack
tools.description: Upgrade backpack size

tools.name: cheat_upgrade_tool
tools.description: Upgrade a tool to max level

tool.description: Tool name: hoe, watering_can, pickaxe, axe

tools.name: cheat_upgrade_all_tools
tools.description: Upgrade all tools to max level

tools.name: cheat_unlock_all
tools.description: Unlock all items at the Casino
